topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55721abe6368723c80040a00#post_55721abe6368723c80040a00
I am 27 Years old,


"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55721a8b63687204dd9f0b00#post_55721a8b63687204dd9f0b00
My point is cartoons can burst the bubble show you things that may not have been shown if you lived in a tiny community with only one frame of mind,


"@Dashu":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55721c766368723c80650d00#post_55721c766368723c80650d00
I am not Racist, but my father is and that is where my brothers picked it up from because they never bothered to open up their minds, now my brothers aren't as bad as my father, but they still think mexican automatically means illegal aliens by default,


"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55721a8163687277a93b0100#post_55721a8163687277a93b0100
Pull your self up by your bootstraps is pretty meaningless when you are 50% less likely to be hired based solely on having a non white sounding name, among other disadvantages being the wrong race brings in America,
